page.title: 06COMMUNITY POLICE DEVELOPMENT
page.content: Prior to 1971 there was a resident policeman at Middle Rasen who lived in the police house on the corner of the new Gallamore Lane. After 1971 the policeman still lived in the house but was based at the police station in Market Rasen. He was responsible for the parishes of Middle Rasen, Spridlington, Faldingworth, West Rasen, Toft Newton, Friesthorpe, Linwood, Buslingthorpe and Legsby. This area was patrolled on a motor cycle. In 1971 this was replaced by a van which was also manned by the Tealby and Osgodby Officers. When these beats were closed down in 1972 the whole area was covered by Officers from Market Rasen.
